name: AS_FRM_getBrandingValueByKey
description: Returns a branding value from the branding configuration file by its key. Checks both _custom and _default branding files.
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!brandingConfigs: getbrandingconfig(ri!defaultBrandingConfigDoc, true),
  
  local!defaultValue: displayvalue(
    tostring(ri!brandingKey),
    touniformstring(local!brandingConfigs.defaultBranding.key),
    local!brandingConfigs.defaultBranding.value,
    null
  ),
  
  local!customValue: displayvalue(
    tostring(ri!brandingKey),
    touniformstring(local!brandingConfigs.customBranding.key),
    local!brandingConfigs.customBranding.value,
    null
  ),
  
  local!type: displayvalue(
    tostring(ri!brandingKey),
    touniformstring(local!brandingConfigs.defaultBranding.key),
    touniformstring(local!brandingConfigs.defaultBranding.type),
    null
  ),
  
  local!returnValue: if(
    isnull(local!customValue),
    local!defaultValue,
    local!customValue
  ),
  
  local!castReturnValue: if(
    contains({"IMAGE", "FAVICON"}, local!type),
    todocument(local!returnValue),
    local!returnValue
  ),
  
  local!castReturnValue
)
